entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
